name: Paracetamol 500mg
description: Used for pain relief and fever reduction. Commonly known as Acetaminophen.

name: Amoxicillin 250mg
description: A broad-spectrum antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections.

name: Cetirizine 10mg
description: An antihistamine used to relieve allergy symptoms like sneezing and runny nose.

name: Metformin 500mg
description: Used to control high blood sugar in people with type 2 diabetes.

name: Ibuprofen 400mg
description: A nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used for pain and inflammation.

name: Omeprazole 20mg
description: A proton pump inhibitor (PPI) used to treat acid reflux and ulcers.

name: Losartan 50mg
description: Used to treat high blood pressure and prevent strokes.

name: Atorvastatin 10mg
description: A statin medication used to lower cholesterol and reduce heart disease risk.

name: Azithromycin 500mg
description: A macrolide antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections like respiratory infections.

name: Vitamin D3 1000 IU
description: A supplement that helps maintain bone health and immune function.
